Module slogo_team01
Package utilities

Class GridPositionComparator

  • java.lang.Object
    • utilities.GridPositionComparator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.Comparator<java.awt.Point>
    public class GridPositionComparator
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.util.Comparator<java.awt.Point>
    Comparator to compare Points which represent grid position in the selector pane. Uses singleton design pattern as only one instance of class is ever required. Only useful for comparing Points which represent grid position in selector pane, would not make sense in any other instance.
    Author:
    Goh Khian Wei

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      int compare​(java.awt.Point o1, java.awt.Point o2)
      Comparison method to compare 2 points representing grid positions.
      static GridPositionComparator getInstance()
      Ensures that only one instance of GridPositionComparator is ever created.
